body.name: Bariatric Fusion High ADEK Multivitamin Capsule with 45mg Iron | Multi for Duodenal Switch Surgery Patients | Easy to Swallow Vitamin | 90 Count | One Month Supply
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 16 mins
features: Bariatric Formulation: This High ADEK bariatric multivitamin with Iron was designed with increased amounts of vitamins A, D, E, and K. Developed by a bariatric surgical team to meet the needs of their duodenal switch patients. It meets all major nutritional guidelines of ASMBS. This supplement is for men and women.

Affordable and Easy Daily Regimen: Each Bottle has 90 capsules and is a One Month Supply. Just 3 small easy to swallow ADEK Bariatric Multivitamin capsules per day for Bariatric Surgery Patients, specifically Duodenal Switch Patients.

Max Potency: Each easy to swallow capsule contains the highest amounts of 21 Bariatric specific essential vitamins and minerals required after bariatric surgery with additional Vitamin ADEK. Packed with over 21 Bariatric specific vitamins and minerals including 45mg of Iron.

Formulated by Bariatric Surgical Team: Designed for maximum absorption by a bariatric surgical team to meet the needs of their bariatric patients. Over 15 years have experience has helped us develop the best bariatric products on the market. Meets or exceeds the ASMBS Guidelines.

Brand You Trust: Bariatric Fusion was founded by a Bariatric Practitioner over 15 Years ago. Our goal has been to create a simple, great tasting, and affordable daily vitamin regimen for bariatric patients post surgery. We are committed to providing the highest quality bariatric vitamins. Our products are Made in the USA from globally-sourced ingredients in GMP certified facilities.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Over a decade ago, Bariatric Fusion was created by a bariatric practitioner who was frustrated with the supplements that were being offered to patients that were extremely expensive and had a very difficult daily regimen. Something had to be done in order to increase patient compliance and improve outcomes after weight loss surgery. Bariatric Fusion has perfected the taste, texture and consistency of the supplements offered and all have been scientifically formulated to meet the needs of bariatric patients. Bariatric Fusion's great tasting and affordable supplements are proven to be effective in preventing micronutrient deficiency after surgery and patients are living the happy and healthy lifestyle they deserve.

Bariatric ADEK Multivitamin Capsule with 45mg Iron for Duodenal Switch Patients, 90 Count, 1 Month Supply Bariatric Fusion Bariatric Multivitamin ADEK Capsule with 45mg Iron provide an easy and efficient way for weight loss patients to get their daily bariatric vitamins. Designed and formulated by a team of bariatric practitioners to meet the needs of their patients who need additional ADEK Vitamins. With just three capsules per day, this unique formula uses the most biologically available bariatric vitamins and minerals to maximize absorption. Patients are raving about how easy, affordable, and convenient our capsules are. The multivitamin is intended for those who need additional A, D, E, and K Vitamins. This most commonly seen in Duodenal Switch patients.

Affordable Bariatric Fusion ADEK Multivitamin with 45mg Iron Capsules are the most affordable way for bariatric patients to get the additional ADEK vitamins you need. Each bottle is a one month supply. Convenient Only three capsules per day make this the easy way for bariatric patients who need additional Vitamin ADEK to get their vitamins. Each capsules uses the most biologically available bariatric vitamins and minerals to maximize absorption. Bariatric Formulated Bariatric Fusion ADEK Multivitamin with 45mg Iron Capsules are designed for maximum absorption by a bariatric surgical team to meet the needs of their bariatric patients who need additional vitamin ADEK. This is most commonly seen in Duodenal Switch Patients. Product is designed to meet ASMBS guidelines.

ADEK Multivitamin Capsule with Iron ADEK Multivitamin Complete Chewable Texture Easy to Swallow Capsule Chewable Tablet Flavor No Flavor Mixed Berry Affordable ✓ ✓ Great Tasting ✓ ✓ Easy Daily Regimen ✓ ✓

The Bariatric Fusion Family Our ADEK Multivitamin Capsule is one of the many high-standard nutritional products offered under Bariatric Fusion. Complete Chewable Multivitamin & Mineral SupplementsHigh Protein, Low Carb Meal Replacement ProteinADEK Multivitamin & Mineral SupplementIron with Vitamin C Soft Chews Calcium Soft ChewsMultivitamin SoftchewsAnd much more! Our company has drawn on the experience of medical professionals to develop a complete line of nutritional products. These innovative formulas create the great tasting and most nutritionally superior products on the market, making a difference in the lives of bariatric patients across the globe!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars NEEDED ADEK VITAMEN.
reviews.reviewText: SO FAR SO GOOD . I TAKE THIS , B12, CALCIUM AND VIT D. SO MUCH EASIER

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Always on time
reviews.reviewText: My order is always shipped on time and a reasonable cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Only 1 needed daily
reviews.reviewText: This vitamin was recommended on a list. I like because you only need to take 1 daily. Most of the bariatric vitamins you have to take 2.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very good product. But the flavor is not great
reviews.reviewText: Very good product. But the flavor is not great. I don't like mixed berry but that is the only choice for DS patients.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am a ds bariatric surgery paitent. These are perfect! The levels are more than adequate and no funky taste. My pharmacy stopped filling aquadeks. Best transistion i could have made and tons cheaper than other alternatives

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite Bariatric Multivitamin
reviews.reviewText: I can't do chewable vitamins that taste like vitamins, they make me gag. So, I tried these capsule vitamins and I don't have any issues taking them and no nausea afterwards like some vitamins have done to me in the past. I will definitely continue to purchase these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Todo salió muy bien

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good for bariatric patients
reviews.reviewText: I like this vitamin because it has all the vitamins in it that I need in it to keep my healthy.
